ELEMENT.AUTHOR: Zoovy
ELEMENT.TITLE: Big vertical thumbs with sortable headers (wide)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY:
Designed to be used for apparel, the layout contains taller thumbnails, name, brand and price. Sortable headers on the product list make it easier for customers to find what they're looking for. Contains a wide banner above and below the product list as well as a text block at the bottom.
Note - this layout is over 600 pixels wide.
